description: Describes the name of a person

additional_name.description: An additional name for a Person, can be used for a middle name.

family_name.description: Family name. In India, it is the last name of an Person. This can be used along with givenName instead of the name property.

given_name.description: Given name. In India, it is the first name of a Person. This can be used along with familyName instead of the name property.

call_sign.description: A callsign, as used in broadcasting and radio communications to identify people

honorific_prefix.description: An honorific prefix preceding a Person's name such as Dr/Mrs/Mr.

honorific_suffix.description: An honorific suffix preceding a Person's name such as M.D. /PhD/MSCSW.
